Hamas militants continue to fire on homes related to the Daghmash Clan in Gaza City and have begun setting fire to the buildings. The armed members of the clan seem to be putting up very little resistance, as Hamas establishes itself as the dominant force‚Ä¶

So many Israeli sources claimed that Hamas is on the brink of collapse, and can't hold on much longer. Now reports suggest that as many as 7,000 Hamas internal security members have been deployed to Gaza City to establish full civil control over the city.
Pro-Hamas sources report that members of the Daghmash clan killed Palestinian journalist and activist Saleh Al-Jaafrawi, as well as the son of a Hamas official, in Gaza City.
Pro-Hamas sources report that members of the Daghmash clan killed Palestinian journalist and activist Saleh Al-Jaafrawi, as well as the son of a Hamas official, in Gaza City.
Footage showing a Pakistani M114A2 towed howitzer strike on an Afghan Taliban hilltop army post on the Pakistan - Afghanistan border.

Israeli forces intercepted an attempt at smuggling a large quantity of weapons into the West Bank on October 8, and released images of what was seized. 
Included in the captured weapons are: 15 anti-tank launchers, anti-tank rockets, 16 rifles of various types, 53 pistols of various types, 20 hand grenades, 29 claymore mines, 4 FPV drones, and hundreds of bullets. 
The weapons were intended to be transferred to Palestinian armed groups, which have always suffered from low resources due to constant Israeli surveillance, raids, and blockade. This smuggling attempt is the largest in a long time. The Shin Bet claims that the weapons originated from Iran's IRGC.

Three Russian Geran-2 drones struck the Shevchenkivskyi District of Kharkiv City just now. Ukrainian air defence was practically absent, and no drones were shot down. The target of the strikes is currently unknown.

Three Russian Geran-2 drones struck the Shevchenkivskyi District of Kharkiv City just now. Ukrainian air defence was practically absent, and no drones were shot down. The target of the strikes is currently unknown.
A single Russian Geran-2 drone flew into Sumy and struck something in the city.
A single Russian Geran-2 drone flew into Sumy and struck something in the city.

Druzhkovka
The city began preparing for defense.
Druzhkovka  The city began preparing for defense.
Just 9 km from the frontline, yet so many civilians...

Last night, a large-scale Geran-2 drone attack was carried out on Odesa. T17 drones targeted two areas, but the most impacts seemed to have been at the Modna Sumka textiles factory (46.450497, 30.619049), which has not been used for civilian purposes for some time.
Multiple drones were also intercepted by Ukrainian air defence.

Did you guys hear about the new Ghost of Donetsk?

Russian forces have captured the village of Kotlyne, western flank of Pokrovsk, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~446.
Total land area: ~1.10 km¬≤.
The battles for this village lasted for approximately 272 days.

From a Ukrainian channel.
It's incredible that despite being so close to the frontline for three years, Kupyansk was never properly prepared for defence.
Tensions Between Pakistan and Afghanistan, October 12, 2025

Ukrainian Troops Are Fleeing From Kupyansk (Videos)
Kiev forces are facing a serious morale problem in the Kharkiv direction, as the Russian military pushes forward in Kupyansk.
Reports from October 12 indicate that Ukrainian troops cornered in the center of Kupyansk are attempting to flee, despite the risk of being targeted by blocking detachments which were recently reinforced by Kiev with a number of special forces.
Vast parts of the city‚Äôs eastern and western parts are under the control of the Russian military‚Äôs Zapad [West] Group of Forces. Last week, the group began work to clear the city center. The only part of the city that remains under solid Ukrainian control is the southern one.
üëâ

Tactical Encirclement: Ukrainian Units Isolated Near Myroliubivka As Russian Pressure Mounts
Russian forces have captured the settlements of Balagan and Moskovske on the Pokrovsk axis. Russian units are advancing towards the center of Poltavka in the Zaporizhzhia region.
A former UK prime minister has been implicated in receiving payments from a defense industry representative.

Trump Pledges To Solve Pakistani-Afghan Crisis After Deadly Border Clashes 
Dozens of Pakistani and Afghan troops were killed in border clashes that took place on October 11 and 12, bringing the two countries close to war.
The escalation began on October 9, when Afghanistan accused Pakistan of launching strikes against the capital, Kabul, and a market in the province of Paktika. The strikes reportedly targeted senior members of the Tehrik-e-Taliban Pakistan (TTP), which is more commonly known as the Pakistani Taliban, including the group‚Äôs leader Noor Wali Mehsud.
Islamabad had before demanded the Taliban to take action against the TTP who have stepped up attacks in Pakistan, saying they operate from havens in Afghanistan. Kabul, from its side, denied that the group is active on its soil.
üëâ

North Korean Troops Who Fought In Russia‚Äôs Kursk Marched In Pyongyang Parade 
North Korean troops who participated in the battle against Kiev forces in Russia‚Äôs Kursk marched on October 10 at Kim Il-sung Square in Pyongyang in a large parade meant to mark the 80th-anniversary of the founding of the Workers‚Äô Party of Korea.
The battle of Kursk broke out in August of last year, when Kiev forces, backed by foreign mercenaries, infiltrated the region.
With the support of thousands of North Korean troops, the Russian military liberated Kursk in a major counterattack last March.
